data.title: No 1/4 in npt
data.body: I recently purchased the XYZ air pressure gauge, and I must say, I’m thoroughly disappointed. Despite being advertised as compatible with a variety of threads, it didn’t fit any of my tires’ valves. Furthermore, even if it did fit, the accuracy and reliability of the readings were questionable at best. Save your money and invest in a more reputable and reliable air pressure gauge.
